\ Had troubles organizing events with your Alumni? Now, you wont! This app will help you manage events with your Alumni :) Connect with your graduated seniors and broaden your contacts. Consider it as the bridge which will connect you with your seniors :) The only thing that is between you and your Alumni is that button below. Click it to uncover the app\'s speciality
